definition: thin or slender/finely particulate/thin and soft/fine/delicate/trifling/(of a sound) quiet/frugal
to support/frame/rack/framework/classifier for planes, large vehicles, radios etc

sentences.english: Both microtubule and actin cytoskeleton have been shown to be involved in proper nuclear positioning.
sentences.chinese: 細胞骨架微管和肌動蛋白都參與了細胞覈定位的過程。

sentences.english: Also the relationships of cell differentiation and cytoskeletal structure and gene expression were discussed.
sentences.chinese: 本文還討論了細胞分化與細胞骨架及基因表達的關係。

sentences.english: Cytoskeleton dynamics is essential for the directional cell motility and migration.
sentences.chinese: 細胞定向運動與細胞骨架的動態循環密切相關。

sentences.english: Organelles are suspended within it, supported by the filamentous network of the cytoskeleton.
sentences.chinese: 細胞器懸浮在其中，並由絲狀的細胞骨架支撐。

sentences.english: SEM Study on the Stereoscopic Structures of Cortical Cytoskeleton in Euplotes sp.
sentences.chinese: 遊僕蟲皮層細胞骨架立體結構的研究。

sentences.english: The cytoskeleton of LoVo was observed by coomassie brilliant blue staining.
sentences.chinese: 考馬斯亮藍染色觀察細胞骨架變化。

sentences.english: Cytoskeletal intermediate filaments appear to impart tensile strength to the cell cytoplasm.
sentences.chinese: 細胞骨架的中間絲提供了細胞質伸縮動力。

sentences.english: Organelles aresuspended within it, supported by the filamentous network of the cytoskeleton.
sentences.chinese: 細胞器懸浮在其中，並由絲狀的細胞骨架支撐。
